_header: Iste puer is a prince that is peerless
Subjects: sermons, verse in; Christ, uniqueness of
_description: Christ’s singularity — four monorhyming lines in a Latin Sermo in natali domini

CULIi38.Transcription:
Iste puer is a prynce þat is perleshe is a mayster þat is
                    makeleshe is a lord þat is lacleshe is wit þat is
                    wemles
CULIi38.Note: Last two lines of earlier entry now 5585.
CULIi38.Editions:
Stemmler,  Theo. 
             “More English Texts from MS. Cambridge University Library
                Ii.III.8.” 
             Anglia
         93 (1975): 1-16: 15.
